w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Putnami Web Toolkit
w:HTMLPanel.p:
PWT is modern and powerful UI framework.
Built upon GWT, PWT is robust, lightweight and efficient. Made for ourself, we designed it to increase our productivity, we focused to remove the useless code. Free and Open source, PWT is published under LGPL v 3.0.

ul.li: Thanks to Twitter 's Bootstrap, your webapp are responsive and easily themable.
The nice widgets are easy to extend and to customize.
The data binding is a pushover, build forms and dynamic tables is so simple.
Server calls are optimized and simplified. Multiplex your queries, and bind the callbacks with annotations.
The Navigation is done to simplified MVP. Split and scale your webapp without even knowing.
Neither third librairies nor external JS are required. Providing security and serenity for your achievements and our future.

w:HTMLPanel.p: Easy to start, PWT is a serious alternative for your next webapp.
